headline: What Makes Leidos (LDOS) a New Strong Buy Stock
summary: Leidos (LDOS) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

raw.headline: What Makes Leidos (LDOS) a New Strong Buy Stock

headline: Does Leidos Offer Growth Potential After 28.8% Rally and $1.8B Army Contract Win?
summary: If you're keeping an eye on Leidos Holdings and wondering whether now is the right time to make your move, you're not alone. The stock has powered its way up an impressive 28.8% so far this year, a leap that stands out even in a market full of surprises. Over the last five years, investors have seen a remarkable 136.3% return, proving Leidos’s staying power among major defense and technology plays. Yet, the past month has delivered a slight dip of 1.6% and a more modest 9.9% gain over the...
